content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 5, Granada CF 0.

Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 5, Granada CF 0. Filipe Luis (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Adrián López.
